item.title: 헷갈리는 곱셈들
item.description: 점곱(dot product), 스칼라곱(scalar product) vs 내적(inner product) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dot_product vs https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inner_product_space 가위곱(cross product), 벡터곱(vector product) vs 외적(exterior product) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross_product vs https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exterior_algebra
